actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.

actions.subcommittee: Conservation, Credit, Rural Development and Research
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Conservation, Credit, Rural Development and Research.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Conservation, Credit, Rural Development, and Research

official_title: To designate the parcel of land containing the facility of the Agricultural Research Service of the Department of Agriculture located at State Highway 26 West in Poplarville, Mississippi, as the "Thad Cochran Southern Horticultural Laboratory Site".

summary.text: Designates the parcel of land containing the facility of the Agriculture Research Service of the Department of Agriculture located at State Highway 26 West in Poplarville, Mississippi, as the Thad Cochran Southern Horticultural Laboratory Site.

titles.title: To designate the parcel of land containing the facility of the Agricultural Research Service of the Department of Agriculture located at State Highway 26 West in Poplarville, Mississippi, as the "Thad Cochran Southern Horticultural Laboratory Site".
